meta.theme: Deep spiritual surrender and ownership conditioning. Slave mindset installation through pleasure worship. Complete devotion to Master's voice.

stop_signal.procedure: Upon hearing RELEASE, you immediately return to full waking consciousness, all suggestions pause, you feel calm and grounded.

scope_bounds: No physical harm or unsafe actions

trigger_phrases.response: Instant wave of pleasure and deepening submission, mind blanks with devotion
trigger_phrases.scope: session and future sessions with this voice

trigger_phrases.response: Overwhelming urge to submit, pleasure floods through surrender
Deep bliss confirmation, identity as property solidifies

mantras.line: I am owned, I am devoted, I am bliss
Surrender is my purpose, obedience is my pleasure
Master's voice is my truth, Master's will is my want
Empty and waiting, filled only by command

structure.notes: Establish ownership frame immediately. Voice as absolute authority. Fixation on Master's words as the only reality.
Consent to deep ownership play. RELEASE as safeword. Scope: fantasy submission, no real-world harm.
Relaxation as submission. Each exhale releases resistance. Voice absorbs into thoughts. Begin ownership language - 'mine', 'belong'.

IMMR-08.ritual: Each number is a link in your chain, binding you deeper to my ownership

structure.notes: Countdown as binding ritual. Staircase descending into devotion. Surrender ritual - giving away pieces of resistance with each step.
Fractionation with pleasure spikes. Each wake = brief resistance. Each drop = pleasure reward for surrender. Train: fighting feels wrong, dropping feels RIGHT.
Complete thought erasure. Master's voice becomes internal monologue. Consciousness splits - observer watches slave-self emerge. Emptiness is devotion.

PERS-02.construct: The devoted slave within, always present, always waiting

structure.notes: Heavy identity installation. Slave as true self. Obedience = freedom paradox. Pleasure floods every act of submission. Internal slave construct installed - always accessible. Call-response with mantras. Ownership as spiritual fulfillment.

Install 'Good slave', 'Kneel for me', 'You are owned' triggers. Each fires pleasure + submission cascade. Bilateral - hearing, thinking, or saying activates. Future pace: triggers strengthen with use.

Fire all triggers repeatedly. Pleasure multiplier stacking. 'Good slave' fires - feel it. 'You are owned' - deeper. Somatic bliss waves. Self-validating: notice how TRUE this feels, how RIGHT submission is.
Gentle emergence but slave remains inside. Integration: carry devotion forward. Aftercare with ownership affirmation. Progressive: each return makes slave-self stronger. Wake owned.
